remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可让您的新值不是有效时取消对当前单元格的更改。The event lets you cancel changes to the current cell when the new value is not valid. 使用属性来确定的当前值。Use the property to determine the current value. 若要确定当前的单元格的状态，请使用和属性访问通过的单元格集合。To determine the state of the current cell, use the and properties to access the cell through the collection. 若要取消更改，将设置属性`true`。To cancel the change, set the property to `true`. 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时不会引发事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以确保仅正整数来表示所输入的用户。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic.
